name: Shields and Arrows
description:
Fast and easy mini-game where you play as a brave knight!

Of the objects you only have a shield with which you must protect yourself from arrows!

The game was made for Linkware's Jam with the theme "Something's Wrong".

And this "Something" is reverse control and unusual scoring and health drain, all described below! 

Controls:

    turn right

    turn left

Also, if the arrow hits the player, then you get one point, and if the arrow hits the shield, then one health is taken from you.

All this is the theme fit!

ALL GRAPHIC WAS MADE BY NICOMPANY

Good luck and enjoy!
